thig5.12:4.1: I used to be in a sorry state.
thig5.12:4.4: I got neither food nor clothes.
thig5.12:5.1: I took a bowl and a staff
thig5.12:5.2: and went begging from family to family.
thig5.12:7.2: Paṭācārā gave me the going forth.
thig5.12:7.4: she urged me on to the ultimate goal.
thig5.12:8.3: The lady’s advice was not in vain:
thig5.12:8.4: master of the three knowledges, I am free of defilements.
thig5.12:10.1: The Book of the Fives is finished.
